verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come and let your presence newline Fill our praise, fill our praise newline Come and let Your presence fill this place

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You are the one we want to meet newline Jesus shine though all the praises that we sing

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: We have come to give You newline Highest praise, highest praise newline We have come to love You in this place

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Its all for you newline Here we are, here we are

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: So open up heaven newline open up heaven
